original_text: Therefore their inhabitants were of small power, they were dismayed and confounded; they were as the grass of the field, and as the green herb, as the grass on the house tops, and as corn blasted before it be grown up.
korean_text: 그러므로 거기에 거주하는 백성의 힘이 약하여 두려워하며 놀랐나니 그들은 들의 채소와 푸른 풀과 지붕의 잡초와 자라기 전에 시든 곡초 같이 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore their inhabitants were of small power
they were as the grass of the field
as the grass on the house tops
and as corn blasted before it be grown up
